verse.name: c1
verse.lines: O, behold the Man of sorrows! newline O, behold Him in plain view! newline Lo! He is the mighty conqu'ror newline Since He rent the veil in two. newline Lo! He is the mighty conqu'ror newline Since He rent the veil in two.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Once our blessed Christ of beauty newline Was veiled off from human view; newline But thro' suff'ring, death, and sorrow newline He has rent the veil in two.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Yes, He is with God, the Father, newline Interceding there for you; newline For He is the mighty conqu'ror newline Since He rent the veil in two.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Holy angels bow before Him, newline Men of earth give praises due; newline For He is the well beloved, newline Since He rent the veil in two.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thro'out time and endless ages, newline Heights and depths of love so true, newline He alone can be the giver, newline Since He rent the veil in two.
